title: Health bar bug?
body:
The health bars of all of the champions in the game show up as grey for me. The usernames are also black. Could anyone help me fix this? I added a picture for reference. Thanks.

http://imgur.com/KV5t9SV

replies.body:
Oh hey, I think I have the solution for this problem. In my case, changing the resolution during the game fixes the bug issue. Not sure if this will also work for others but at least it works for me, so why not give it a try?

Here are the pics of how I did it:

During the loading screen:
http://i65.tinypic.com/2u8xjlh.png[/IMG]

During game play:

I tried it first in the Custom Game then in PvP and it still works for me. Hopefully, this helps! {{champion:81}}
i had the same problem and it was a pain. i tried your method and it worked but you have to do it in beginning of every game which is still a pain. at least it works. thanks a lot mate
Hey! Thanks so much for your reply! I'll have to try this when I get home, and I'll let you know if it works. If anyone else tries this out, please let us know how it went for you.

Hey! So I just tried it, and it works! I'll have to see if it keeps persisting and I have to change my resolution every time. Thanks a lot! :D

That's a really strange is, and tbh it looks kind of cool.  :D  Are you using any overlays or third party programs?  This could cause what you're seeing, so disabling them would be your best bet.  Let me know!

Hey, thanks for the quick reply! It does look pretty cool haha I wouldn't complain but it's really hard to see when my teammates are losing health :( And I don't think I am? I haven't added or deleted anything on my computer and it was completely fine yesterday!

Thanks for getting back to me, and I see the thread is gaining some momentum with more reports.  It's pretty strange, but I noticed something in some of the screenshots here.  Does disabling** Colorblind Mode** resolve this issue?

 This could be a bug!  For example, something may have become corrupted within the config settings.  As another step, let me know if resetting your config fixes this:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KuoMVOAZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-15T15:42:32.843+0000)
>
> Thanks for getting back to me, and I see the thread is gaining some momentum with more reports.  It's pretty strange, but I noticed something in some of the screenshots here.  Does disabling** Colorblind Mode** resolve this issue?

Simply changing the resolution, disabling ** Colorblind Mode** or not, still resolves the issue. But sad thing is, you need to keep on doing it every start of the game so everything will be back to normal.
Thanks for the info!  Try the config reset and let me know if it works as a more permanent fix.

I have the same problem. and it is not cool. and btw when your customer reports glitches or bugs to you, it is a notice to you that your company is not doing a good job today. it is not funny. it is a problem that is being reported, it is not cool.

This bug came back to me again so I had to do the same ritual by changing the resolution. However, I found out another way to resolve this issue that is less hassle. 

Instead of changing the resolution at the beginning of every game, just press Ctrl+Alt+Del during the loading screen and just cancel it after, then League returns back to normal.

Everything went back to normal for me today. It seemed that the bug issue could only happen for one day. Maybe League already fixed it so yours have probably gone back to normal too.

Guys just keep spamming alt+tab, but not to fast you want to alt+tab to client or desktop and after that you come back to lol and just keep spamming that, if your lol gets black, you can just alt+tab in to it, after black screen coolors get back to normal, you need to do this in game not on loading screen, and it works for one game and you need to do it again next game. #RITOFIXIT

I'm having the same issue, it just began yesterday. One moment it was fine and the next game it wasn't. This issue makes it extremely hard to distinguish teammates from enemies as well as tell if someone is low.
